page.title: 04Education-The College.
page.content:
{Llandovery}has{three schools.}The College (a private school), the County High and the County Primary School.
Llandovery{College}has{250 pupils. The majority, 220, being boys and 30 girls.There are 12 day students and {238 boarders}30 of which are overseas students.{There are 24 on the teaching {staff.}Lessons are taken through the medium of both Welsh and English. The following{subjects}are taught: English, Welsh, French, German, Latin, Greek, History, Geography, Classical Studies, Divinity, Ancient History, Music, Art, Biology, Geology, Chemistry, Phyics, Mathematics, and Physical Education.
